评论详情: Gold chunky double chain necklace it can be worn as a choker. Has a hook to adjust the size of the necklace. The style is nice great value for the price this is a statement piece looks so elegant.
Ordered this dainty choker layered necklace and am absolutely pleased with the quality and style. Each necklace has its own style and provides a modern look.

评论概述: Substantial and shiny but very yellow
评论详情: This layered necklace is very pretty and feels heavy. It has a trendy, chunky style. All three necklaces are connected in the back to make one necklace so it shouldn't tangle as easy as three separate necklaces.  I like everything about it except that the gold tone is very yellow, so it doesn't look high-quality. I have lots of gold plated jewelry, and when you hold this next to those pieces you can tell how yellow it is instead of a true gold tone. I wasnt able to capture it in pictures.  It's a nice necklace, but I don't know if I'll wear it unless I can find a shirt that can offset the unnatural tone.

This faux pearl necklace is absolutely gorgeous! The pearls are large and lustrous, and the choker style is incredibly chic. I love the exaggerated, hip-hop punk vibe of this necklace, and it's the perfect accessory to add a touch of drama to any outfit. I've worn it to weddings, parties, and even just out to dinner, and it always gets compliments. The quality is excellent, and it's very comfortable to wear. I highly recommend this necklace to anyone looking for a bold and beautiful statement piece.
